input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent Assistance Required for Security Issues

A security breach has occurred, compromising medical data on hospital systems You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. This may be due to vulnerabilities in outdated software and improper access controls My name is Sophia Rossi.. A full system audit is being conducted, and passwords have been reset to enhance security.
